title: Was this a joke?
review: I waited till the end, waiting for the main action to begin! I am so glad that I borrowed the DVD from my friend, rather than wasting some money going to the Cinema last year. Amazing location, great cinematography. But hey where is the story?? They were filming her in different poses and locations to send message to the rebellion which all I found very inappropriate in a science fiction thriller movie. And all those rubbish talking about her dress!! Come on guys, you are trying to win a war, not going to a fashion show!!! I don't recommend this. Pile of s****t.
